array: Arr! The <%= key %> ain't an array.
boolean: Arr! The <%= key %> ain't a boolean.
date: Arr! The <%= key %> ain't a date.
float: Arr! The <%= key %> ain't a decimal number.
int: Arr! The <%= key %> ain't an integer.
after: Arr! The <%= key %> ain't after <%= args[0] %>.
before: Arr! The <%= key %> ain't before <%= args[0] %>.
ascii: Arr! The <%= key %> contains pesky non-ascii characters!
base64: Arr! The <%= key %> ain't base64 encoded.
between: Arr! The <%= key %> must be <%= args[0] %> and <%= args[1] %> characters long.
byteLength: Arr! The <%= key %> must be <%= args[0] %> and <%= args[1] %> bytes long.
contains: Arr! The <%= key %> must contain <%= args[0] %>.
creditCard: Arr! The <%= key %> not be a valid credit card number.
email: Arr! The <%= key %> not be a valid email.
FQDN: Arr! The <%= key %> not be a valid domain name.
hexadecimal: Arr! The <%= key %> not be a hexadecimal number.
hexColor: Arr! The <%= key %> note be a hexadecimal color.
IP: Arr! The <%= key %> not be a valid IP address.
ISBN: Arr! The <%= key %> not be valid ISBN.
JSON: Arr! The <%= key %> not be valid JSON.
length: Arr! The <%= key %> not be <%= args[0] %> characters long.
longer: Arr! The <%= key %> ain't more than <%= args[0] %> characters long.
matches: Arr! The <%= key %> not be the right format.
mongoId: Arr! The <%= key %> not be a valid ID.
shorter: Arr! The <%= key %> ain't shorter than <%= args[0] %> characters.
Arr! The <%= key %> ain't shorter than <%= args[0] %> characters.
URL: Arr! The <%= key %> not be a valid URL.
UUID: Arr! The <%= key %> not be a valid UUID<%= args[0] || '' %>!
divisibleBy: Arr! The <%= key %> ain't multiple of <%= args[0] %>.
greaterThan: Arr! The <%= key %> ain't more than <%= args[0] %>.
lessThan: Arr! The <%= key %> ain't less than <%= args[0] %>!
within: Arr! The <%= key %> ain't greater than <%= args[0] %> and less than <%= args[1] %>!
equals: Arr! The <%= key %> ain't matchin' <%= args[0] %>.
in: Arr! The <%= key %> be one of: <%= args.join(', ') %>.
